Method Detail

byteArrayToHexStringWithSpaces

public static java.lang.String byteArrayToHexStringWithSpaces(byte[] in)
converts byte[] into a String with space separators

Parameters:
in - input buffer
Returns:
a String

Description:
This method is useful for converting numerical hex values into a 'viewable' string

Example:
in- {17, 34, -16, -162} (= {0x11, 0x22, 0xF0, 0x5E})
return- "11 22 F0 5E"

byteArrayToHexString

public static java.lang.String byteArrayToHexString(byte[] in,
                                                    int start,
                                                    int count)
converts byte[] into a String

Parameters:
in - input buffer
start - first index (must be even)
count - number of bytes to convert (must be >0 and even)
Returns:
a String

Description:
This method is useful for converting numerical hex values into a 'viewable' string
This method is the complementary method to hexStringToByteArray(String str, int start, int count)

Example:
in- {17, 34, -16, -162} (= {0x11, 0x22, 0xF0, 0x5E})
start- 0
count- 4
return- "1122F05E"

a String

This method is useful for converting numerical hex values into a 'viewable' string
This method is the complementary method to hexStringToByteArray(String str)

byteToHexString

public static java.lang.String byteToHexString(byte in)
converts one byte value into a String

Parameters:
in - byte
Returns:
a String

Description:
This method is useful for converting numerical hex values into a 'viewable' strings
This method is the complementary method to hexStringToByte(String str)

Example:
in- 17 (= 0x11)
return- "11"

hexStringToByte

public static byte hexStringToByte(java.lang.String str)
converts a String into one byte value

Parameters:
str - input String
Returns:
a byte

Description:
This method is useful for converting 'viewable' strings into numerical hex values
This method is the complementary method to byteToHexString(byte in)

Example:
in- "11"
return- 17 (=0x11)

hexStringToByteArray

public static byte[] hexStringToByteArray(java.lang.String str,
                                          int start,
                                          int count)
converts a String into a byte[]

Parameters:
str - input String (must have even length)
start - first index (must be even)
count - number of chars to convert (must be >0 and even)
Returns:
byte[]

Description:
This method is useful for converting 'viewable' strings into numerical hex values
This method is the complementary method to byteArrayToHexString(byte[] in, int start, int count)

Example:
in- "1122F05E"
start- 0
count- 8
return- {17, 34, -16, -162} (= {0x11, 0x22, 0xF0, 0x5E})

in- "1122F05E"

isHexString

public static boolean isHexString(java.lang.String str)
checks a String if it contains only hex chars (0..9; a..f; A..F)

Parameters:
str - input String
Returns:
true, if String contains only hex chars

Description:
This method checks a String if it contains only hex chars (0..9; a..f; A..F)

Example 1:
in- "1122F05E"
return- true

Example 2:
in- "112YF05E"
return- false
